short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep all your CerberusX compiles running in one tab. Also supports MonkeyX... and Treebeard!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin will automatically "manage" your running tabs when you build from monkey/cerberus/treebeard. This means that no longer will you have to close down a hundered running apps! This can be toggled by clicking the toolbar icon!
